title: Mesotherapy for the Face and Lips Using Hyaluron Pen
headline: Master mesotherapy and learn to use the Hyaluron Pen for facial treatments in this free online cosmetology course.
description: Mesotherapy rejuvenates the skin by depositing substances and nutrients that moisten and tighten the skin. As a non-surgical procedure, it has become popular in many beauty salons as a cheaper skincare alternative for clients. This cosmetology course explores the tools and techniques used to successfully apply this beauty-enhancing treatment. We also discuss aftercare, contraindications and the professional results your clients can expect.
courseDescription:
Mesotherapy is gaining popularity as a way to revitalise the skin and give clients a more youthful appearance. This beauty procedure does not use needles and can therefore be offered without requiring any medical licence. Kristina Bagrova, the publisher, is a beautician and expert instructor with nearly two decades’ experience. This course teaches you a step-by-step approach to using the Hyaluron Pen for face and lip treatments. 

The course begins with an overview of what the treatment entails and how the Hyaluron Pen works. We examine the tools required throughout the process and explain how to use them properly. Before any procedure begins, you must prepare the client and remove their makeup. Next, you must prepare the client's face by cleaning and disinfecting it to prevent infection. Finally, you will learn how to mark faces for treatment and how to properly position the pen to inject product into the skin.

Aftercare is also an essential measure in the beauty industry. This step includes checking for contraindications and complications and explaining what the client can expect following the procedure. Our video lessons demonstrate the procedure on the face and the lips, teaching you how to achieve the best result for your client. We show you how to find out from your local authorities if you are legally permitted to carry out this procedure. Mesotherapy is one more technique to add to your repertoire of beauty services and could benefit your business tremendously. Sign up today!
